constituent: storm, mountain, wind, gnats, drop, insect
koohiiStory1: Storm is a full-blown wind that rips the mountains off the ground (you see one flying here).
koohiiStory2: Winds are gathering at the base of the mountain (note the hint to primitive placement), going up, and turning into a huge mountain storm.
myStory: bão. gió dưới núi là bão
